jobDescription: Spearhead vendor development and procurement activities for plant commodities, packaging materials, equipment spares, and capital items. Develop and assess new vendors based on quality, cost, delivery, and management tools. Optimize the procurement cycle using supply chain tools to reduce plant inventory. Introduce value engineering to reduce procurement and product costs. Coordinate with various departments to implement value engineering solutions. Improve procurement efficiency by analyzing and identifying non-value-added activities. Regularly review supplier capacity and cost, taking proactive actions to address any issues. Ensure zero production stoppages due to material shortages.
